total_revenue.context: Q2 FY26 revenue of $10.2 billion, up 10% year over year and 9% in constant currency.

subscription_support_revenue.context: Subscription and support revenue rose 11% year over year and 9% in constant currency.

non_gaap_operating_margin.context: Q2 non-GAAP operating margin expanded to 34.3%, marking the tenth straight quarter of margin growth.

operating_cash_flow.context: Q2 operating cash flow of $740 million.

free_cash_flow.context: Q2 free cash flow of $605 million.

full_year_operating_cash_flow.context: FY26 expected operating cash flow approaching $15 billion per guidance.

full_year_free_cash_flow.context: FY26 expected free cash flow of roughly $14 billion.

capital_expenditures.context: CapEx remains near 2% of revenue as part of disciplined capital allocation.

data_cloud_ai_arr.context: Data Cloud plus AI ARR reached $1.2 billion, growing 120% year over year.

total_deals.context: Since launch, Salesforce closed over 12,500 Agent Force deals with more than 6,000 paid.

examples: DIRECTV reduced inquiry handling by 300 hours with agentic service.
Pandora scaled from 1 to 3 agents in a quarter.
Williams Sonoma deployed agents across eight brands, including a sous-chef agent.

current_rpo.context: Current RPO of $29.4 billion, up 11% year over year and 10% in constant currency.

total_rpo.context: Total RPO of $59.9 billion, up 12% year over year.

large_deals.context: Q2 closed over 60 deals greater than $1 million that included both Data Cloud and AI.

regional_strength.context: Strong new business in Americas and pockets of EMEA (Netherlands, Switzerland); UK and Japan remain measured.

agentic_enterprise.description: Artificial intelligence is embedded across Salesforce’s apps, data, and agents, enabling the ‘agentic enterprise’ vision.
initiatives: Agent Force version 4 with expanded Slack-first agents, ITSM, and government-ready solutions.
Flexible payment options (Flex Credits, pay-as-you-go) to lower barriers to experimentation.
Agent Force Command Center, deterministic workflows, and deeper integration with Data Cloud for production reliability.
results: 40% of Q2 Agent Force and Data Cloud bookings came from existing customer expansions.
24/7 instant support expanded to six new languages, now covering over 94% of case volume.
Pipeline up in the high teens with big deals approaching 20% growth.

ecosystem_and_m_and_a.description: Balanced investment in organic product innovation and selective acquisitions to accelerate data and agentic capabilities.
highlights: Closed acquisitions of Convergence AI, Blue Birds and Y; definitive agreement to buy Regrello for agentic supply chain.
Informatica acquisition expected to close in late FY26 or early FY27 and remains outside current guidance.
Slack and MuleSoft continue to serve as the agentic operating system layer for customers and partners including OpenAI and Anthropic.

revenue_guidance.growth: 8.5% - 9% nominal and ~8% CC with $300M FX tailwind
revenue_guidance.context: Raised the low end of FY26 revenue guidance to $41.1B - $41.3B.

subscription_support_growth.context: Subscription and support revenue growth expectation for FY26.

non_gaap_operating_margin.context: Non-GAAP operating margin guidance raised to 34.1%.

crpo_growth.context: CRPO growth guidance for Q3, with $300M favorable FX impact.

share_repurchases.context: Repurchased $24.3 billion since inception of the $50B authorization, including $2.2B in Q2.

total_return.context: Nearly $27 billion returned to shareholders since the program began.
